named-query.name: getProcessInstances
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log ORDER BY log.processId, log.start

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByStatus
named-query.query:
select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance)
from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states)

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByStatusAndInitiator
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.identity = :initiator

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByDeploymentId
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.externalId=:externalId and log.status in (:states)

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessDefinition
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.processId =:processDefId

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceById
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId =:processId

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceByCorrelationKey
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.correlationKey =:correlationKey and log.status = 1

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByCorrelationKey
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.correlationKey like :correlationKey order by log.id

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByCorrelationKeyAndStatus
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.correlationKey like :correlationKey and log.status in (:states) order by log.id

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessIdAndStatus
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processId like :processId

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessIdAndStatusAndInitiator
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processId like :processId and log.identity = :initiator

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessNameAndStatus
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processName like :processName

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessNameAndStatusAndInitiator
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processName like :processName and log.identity = :initiator

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByVariableName
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processInstanceId in (select vlog.processInstanceId from VariableInstanceLog vlog where vlog.variableId like :variable) ORDER BY log.processId, log.start

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByVariableNameAndValue
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processInstanceId in (select vlog.processInstanceId from VariableInstanceLog vlog where vlog.variableId=:variable and vlog.value like :variableValue and vlog.id in (select max(vlog2.id) from VariableInstanceLog vlog2 where vlog2.variableId = vlog.variableId group by vlog2.processInstanceId)) ORDER BY log.processId, log.start

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByParent
named-query.query:
select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription, log.correlationKey, log.parentProcessInstanceId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance)
from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.parentProcessInstanceId = :parentId

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceFullHistory
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId, log.referenceId, log.nodeContainerId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId=:processId ORDER BY log.date DESC, log.id DESC

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceFullHistoryByType
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId, log.referenceId, log.nodeContainerId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId=:processId AND log.type=:type ORDER BY log.date DESC, log.id DESC

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceActiveNodes
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId, log.referenceId, log.nodeContainerId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.nodeInstanceId in ( select nil.nodeInstanceId from NodeInstanceLog nil where nil.processInstanceId=:processId GROUP BY nil.nodeInstanceId HAVING sum(nil.type) = 0) and log.type = 0 and log.processInstanceId=:processId order by log.id ASC

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceCompletedNodes
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId, log.referenceId, log.nodeContainerId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.nodeInstanceId in (select nodeInstanceId from NodeInstanceLog nid where nid.processInstanceId=:processId AND nid.type = 1 GROUP BY nid.nodeInstanceId HAVING sum(nid.type) >= 1) and log.type = 1 and log.processInstanceId=:processId ORDER BY log.id ASC

named-query.name: getNodeInstanceForWorkItem
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId, log.referenceId, log.nodeContainerId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.workItemId=:workItemId and log.type = 0 ORDER BY log.nodeInstanceId, log.id ASC

named-query.name: getNodeInstancesByNodeType
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId, log.referenceId, log.nodeContainerId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId=:processInstanceId and log.nodeType in (:nodeTypes) ORDER BY log.nodeInstanceId

named-query.name: getNodeInstancesByCorrelationKeyAndNodeType
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId, log.referenceId, log.nodeContainerId, log.slaDueDate, log.slaCompliance ) from ProcessInstanceLog plog, NodeInstanceLog log where plog.correlationKey like :correlationKey and plog.status in (:states) and plog.processInstanceId=log.processInstanceId and log.nodeType in (:nodeTypes) ORDER BY log.nodeInstanceId

named-query.name: getVariablesCurrentState
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.VariableStateDesc( log.variableId, log.variableInstanceId, log.oldValue, log.value, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date ) from VariableInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId =:processInstanceId AND log.id in (select max(vss.id) FROM VariableInstanceLog vss WHERE vss.processInstanceId =:processInstanceId group by vss.variableId ) order by log.id

named-query.name: getVariableHistory
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.VariableStateDesc( log.variableId, log.variableInstanceId, log.oldValue, log.value, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date ) from VariableInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId =:processInstanceId AND log.variableId =:variableId order by log.id DESC

named-query.name: getTaskInstanceById
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.UserTaskInstanceDesc( a.taskId, a.status, a.activationTime, a.name, a.description, a.priority, a.actualOwner, a.createdBy, a.deploymentId, a.processId, a.processInstanceId, a.createdOn, a.dueDate ) from AuditTaskImpl a where a.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getTaskInstanceByWorkItemId
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.UserTaskInstanceDesc( a.taskId, a.status, a.activationTime, a.name, a.description, a.priority, a.actualOwner, a.createdBy, a.deploymentId, a.processId, a.processInstanceId, a.createdOn, a.dueDate ) from AuditTaskImpl a where a.workItemId = :workItemId

named-query.name: getTaskInstancesByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.UserTaskInstanceDesc( a.taskId, a.status, a.activationTime, a.name, a.description, a.priority, a.actualOwner, a.createdBy, a.deploymentId, a.processId, a.processInstanceId, a.createdOn, a.dueDate ) from AuditTaskImpl a where a.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId and a.status in ( :statuses)

named-query.name: getDeploymentUnit
named-query.query: select d from DeploymentStoreEntry d where d.deploymentId=:deploymentId

named-query.name: getDeploymentUnitsByDate
named-query.query: select d from DeploymentStoreEntry d where d.updateDate >= :ludate

named-query.name: getDeploymentUnitsByState
named-query.query: select d from DeploymentStoreEntry d where d.state in (:state)

named-query.name: getQueryDefinitionByName
named-query.query: select qd from QueryDefinitionEntity qd where name = :name

named-query.name: getQueryDefinitions
named-query.query: select qd from QueryDefinitionEntity qd

named-query.name: getErrorByIdSkipAckCheck
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.error, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.errorId =:errorId order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrorById
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.error, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.errorId =:errorId and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrorsByTaskId
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.type= 'Task' and error.activityId =:taskId and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrorsByTaskName
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.type= 'Task' and error.activityName =:taskName and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrorsByTaskNameProcessId
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.type= 'Task' and error.processId =:processId and error.activityName =:taskName and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrorsByTaskNameProcessIdDeploymentId
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.type= 'Task' and error.deploymentId =:deploymentId and error.processId =:processId and error.activityName =:taskName and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrorsByProcessId
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.deploymentId =:deploymentId and error.processId =:processId and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrorsByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.processInstanceId =:processInstanceId and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrorsByProcessInstanceIdNodeName
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.processInstanceId =:processInstanceId and error.activityName =:nodeName and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getErrors
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC

named-query.name: getTaskErrors
named-query.query: select new org.kie.internal.runtime.error.ExecutionError( error.errorId, error.type, error.deploymentId, error.processInstanceId, error.processId, error.activityId, error.activityName, error.jobId, error.errorMessage, error.acknowledged, error.acknowledgedBy, error.acknowledgedAt, error.errorDate ) from ExecutionErrorInfo error where error.type= 'Task' and error.acknowledged in (:ack) order by error.errorDate DESC
